review:
*** ****** ** *** **** ************* *** ******* *** **** ************* ************** Her patience and genuine care makes all the difference, especially during those anxious moments as a parent. What sets Dr. Ritika apart is her ability to connect with children. Her gentle approach and thoughtful interactions put my little ones at ease, which is invaluable.

We have complete trust in Dr. Ritika’s expertise and judgment. She is thorough in her examinations and proactive in her approach, ensuring both of my kids receives the best possible care. 

We highly recommend Dr. Ritika to any parent seeking exceptional care for their child. We feel incredibly fortunate to have found such an outstanding pediatrician.
reply_text: Thanku so much for your kind words..

review: Dr Ritika is  not only a skilled doctor but also a very compassionate human being. She has a sympathetic attitude and concern towards her patients, which  is praise worthy. She provides consultation on phone also if there is an immediate need. Her diagnosis is very precise .

Dr. Ritika is a  very good Pediatrician and  I had a great experience with her for my daughter. I really like the way a proper explanation was given for all my concerns . I would highly recommend Dr. Ritika  to everyone .

It’s been a great experience with Dr. Ritika I consulted for my my 2 year old son when he was in fever and cold. Since, then she has been our doctor she makes sure your child is comforted and consults only the right and required medication I would highly recommend doctor for and rate her services and availability as and when needed during emergency.

Dr Ritika is an exceptional physician. She ** ********* ************* *** *** accurate diagnosis and treatment plan helps my son to get better in a short span. She listens and explains so patiently that all worries get resolved.
